author: Joel Khalili
title: Majority of UK workers think remote working will outlast pandemic
description: Workers inclined to stay at home even after lockdown is lifted.
content:
The majority of UK workers believe the uptick in remote working will outlast the ongoing pandemic, new research has claimed.
